scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:genwebp && npm run build:generate
scripts.deploy:gi: cd public && git init && git add .
scripts.deploy:gra: cd public && git remote add origin git@github.com:useReactPatterns/usereactpatterns.github.io.git
scripts.deploy:ggp: cd public && git push --force origin master
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:cname && npm run deploy:gi && npm run deploy:gc && npm run deploy:gra && npm run deploy:ggp
